Description: This was my favorite Groupon that I have purchased to date. The staff was so welcoming and attentive. The wine was delicious and the espresso cheese was great! I would go back every month if we lived closer. Will purchase again
Name: Cara N.

Description: Lovely experience. Wines were delicious. Atmosphere was comfortable and relaxing. Will definitely return.
Name: L.B. P.

Description: The tasting room is wonderful - rustic, cozy, welcoming, comfortable, etc.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  The wine, of course, was delicious.  This is a place I want to go to every weekend to chill with friends!!!
Name: Stacey C.

Description: It‚Äôs a beautiful winery with a whole lot of amazing wines. They manage to get flavors from grapes never thought possible.  Loved it!  Our hostess was so attentive and knowledgeable. Taking my parents back next week!!!
Name: Sue D.

Description: This has been our favorite winery that we have tried in South Jersey.  The atmosphere is cozy and intimate and the staff was very nice. The food was great! We really enjoyed the wine and the cute kitty that graced us with her presence! They even have a shuffleboard table...Highly recommended and we will return.
Name: Suzanne P.

Description: Awesome creatively crafted wines.  Super music to enjoy with a glass or two A really friendly group of servers which make the visit pleasant and makes you want to return again.
Name: Maureen N.

Description: Great spot to hang out and drink wine with friends! Super friendly staff!
Name: Danielle D.

Description:
This was my 3rd time to this Winery and have been at several wine festivals also...And would rerecommend the majority of there wines. In fact have given these wines as gifts several times.However*Skip this one! Groupon doesn't save you anything! Extra $10 for full tasting. And Groupon users clearly got smaller pours. Food offerings are Poor!  Had stuffed pretzel (microwaved) & crustless quiche( i
Which is a small round scrambled egg microwaved) But at least it made us laugh...don't plan on sharing .No cheese,fruit,or crackers on menu like most wineries. Oh and our server informed us they don't give out small plates to eat off of unless the customer request them.We did enjoy the live music thou.
Name: Nadine B.

Description: Wine was delicious, staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Will be returning.
Name: L. P.

Description: This place is great, the people are so sweet, and the wines are even better!
Name: Shana C.

Description: The wine was delicious some unique blends. The pours with the Groupon are just a sip. Literally! That was disappointing especially since the other tasters glasses were more than half full. I've been to to other tastings were they're much more generous. For a few
Name: Sherry L.

Description: Awesome !
Name: Stephanie S.

Description: Fantastic wines, lovely setting, super nice and friendly staff!  Wagonhouse Winery is one of my all-time favorites!
Name: Krista

Description: Live this place..wine tasting fun...quaint place with out door tables to relax at
Name: Darlene C.

Description: This is my updated review.  My last review indicated that while we very much enjoyed our visit there and the wines we tasted, the 5 bottles of wine we bought while we were there had peaked and smelled like and tasted like vinegar. I indicated I had reached out to Wagonhouse regarding a full refund for the 5 bottles of wine.  I am writing again now as I am happy to report that they did issue my daughter and I both a full refund on the wines we purchased.  Based on this experience, they are now back to 5 stars.
Name: LYNN C.

Description: Always a good time at Wagonhouse Winery. Wine is good and staff are friendly.  Enjoyed our visit.
Name: Ella M.

Description: Very friendly staff!
Name: Maurice M.

Description: Great wines.
Name: Thomas C.

Description: very enjoyable love the d√©cor and atomosphere
Name: Anthony P.

Description:
The wines are great, we did our tasting in the gift shop ( off site) it was not a wonderful experience since it seemed like we were at the coffee shop when people kept ordering coffee.
Wine tasting at the winery is always an amazing experience
Name: Rose C.

Description: Adorable winery! Perfect for a small group of friends. The sweet wines were fun and delicious! My boyfriend and I loved it.
Name: Jessica F.

Description: We enjoyed our visit to Wagonhouse Winery so much we purchased a case of wine and then some. Definitely worth the trip with or without a Groupon or other savings voucher.
Name: Richard

Description: Great environment and very good wine. Staff was friendly and attentive. Will definitely be going back. We did make reservations so make sure you do so ahead of time.
Name: Allison M.

Description: Loved it
Name: Shanika E.

Description: Awesome place staff very attentive and wine very tasty for a small winery
Name: Patricia T.

Description: Very country looking. Friendly service...
Name: Cheryl R.

Description: Great atmosphere and place to hang out. It was an enjoyable, relaxing experience.
Name: Tom L.

Description: It was absolutely amazing, such a great friendly environment. A phenomenal host ,definitely would go back!
Name: Semaj G.

Description: Awesome experience! We will be back!
Name: Heather A.

Description: Very nice environment!!!
Name: Zuleykap89 P.

Description: Customer service was a amazing it was absolutely beautiful the wines were very good!!!!
Name: Khristian S.

Description: Wagonhouse winery is beautiful inside and the hostesses were awesome! We had a surprise retirement party for my mom and it was absolutely perfect! I‚Äôd definitely recommend it here and I‚Äôll be sure to go back!
Name: Amy S.

Description: Very nice staff, personable and great tasting sweet wine!!
Name: DEVONIA M.

Description: Very pleasant and friendly service.
Name: Jemal F.

Description: The staff were thoughtful and attentive.  We ordered additional food, which was delicious.  The whole experience was impressive.
Name: Kimberly M.

Description: AMAZING PLACE! Great service as well!
Name: Shae A.

Description: Love this place. I will definitely  go again
Name: Mary L.

Description: Too far from hop
Name: Tom H.

Description: Was not very happy with their service.  I kept being reminded that I was a groupon customer.  Very unprofessional
Name: Dionne M.

Description: Worker conducting tasting was supposedly a new person and had zero knowledge of wines being served.  Her excuse for everything was "I am new".  I had given this as a Christmas gift to friends and it was a shame that they did not enjoy our gift.  I called owner and explained what happened.   He did say sorry and that he'd investigate but offered me no visit back for our friends on the house to make their impression of Wagonhouse better
Name: Mik M.

Description: Love this winery. You get to sample all of their wines, which is about 15! Definitely worth every penny.
Name: Carrie

Description: Wines were good but the service was very slow
Name: Dave W.

Description: Had a great time! Great staff!
Name: Deborah F.

Description: It was ok, it was too crowded
Name: Cheryl C.

Description: Server was excellent! A variety of wines, sweet, semi sweet, fruity, dry, etc. A very nice way to spend a lovely afternoon.
Name: Bill M.

Description: Great atmosphere cool place to hang out with a bar and lounge area!
Name: Samantha N.

Description: went to wagonhouse for my birthday and couldn't have had a better time.  the host was wonderful., the wine was awesome.  this is by far my favorite winery.
Name: Milly H.

Description: The winery was intimate and personable. Staff was extremely knowledgeable and very kind! Great experience
Name: Melissa T.

Description: Fantastic tasting! We chose the dry flight and loved them. So many wines to choose from with unique names. Nutty Quaker was a favorite!
Name: Holly R.

Description: Cozy and welcoming. Awesome hostess. Great wines! You can‚Äôt go wrong going here!
Name: Jennifer G.

Description: Very nice winery! Beautiful rural location. Friendly, engaging staff. We walked away with four yummy bottles of wine after a very relaxing tasting! Will definitely return soon!
Name: Evelyn H.

Description: Excellent service. Knowledgeable staff. Great experience to go out with friends and try something new. The summer wine is amazing.
Name: Alex B.

Description: A wonderful experience. An enjoyable atmosphere. The best wines I have ever had. Three Boys Brand is now my favorite. Our server, Kate, was knowledgeable, fun, helpful. I will go again and again and I truly recommend this deal.
Name: Kellie J.

Description: Very enjoyable afternoon wine tasting!  Lots of wine to try, although there were several wines that were not available.
Name: Beth F.

Description: We had a great time! The wine is delicious, the ambiance is delightful, and our server was personable and knowledgeable. I would and already have recommend this to anyone.
Name: Melissa B.

Description: Super cute tasting room with lots of fun wine accessories!
Name: Crm030710

Description: I absolutely love this place very beautiful laid back nicely decorated amazing place best time of my life actually there wines are phenomenal and I don't drink this was my first time experience I'm 35 the crowd was very laid back the staff amazing I'm hooked and will be back on a regular though it's a hour away to me very worth the drive
Name: Kim H.

Description: Went here for my birthday with a friend.  The staff was extremely knowledgeable and friendly.  The wine was great and the food was terrific.  Would definitely go back again.  Thank you for a great day.
Name: Willow D.

Description: The staff was exceptional! They were very knowledgeable and welcoming.  Wine was delicious too! We will definitely go back there again.
Name: Sarah H.

Description: This was my first time at a wine tasting and it was pretty awesome. The wine was great the staff was very friendly and knowledgeable
Name: Rich G.

Description: Great tasting wine and a very nice staff
Name: Chelsea H.

Description: The wines and staff at Wagonhouse were exceptional! My boyfriend and I scheduled a tasting for his birthday on a Friday afternoon. We were the only two people there for most of our visit which allowed our host to pay extra special attention to us. We will definitely be back!
Name: Heather F.

Description: Very charming and wonderful experience!  Great personal service, delicious wines and lovely surroundings to walk!  Loved it and will return!
Name: Karynlee B.

Description: Great place! The staff was very knowledgable about various types of wine. The wine was so tasty and smooth, I had to buy a bottle to take home!
Name: Jenee M.

Description: Great service and great wine!
Name: Deaysha S.

Description: We had a really good time at Wagonhouse Winery.  The wines were very good.  We do not like dry wines but even they were excellent.  We came home with 1/2 a dozen bottles to enjoy at home.  We would definitely go again.
Name: Peggy C.

Description: Extremely friendly and welcoming staff! Wines are great I bought six bottles!!!
Name: Nieasha N.

Description: Great place with amazing wine and wonderful people. It had such a cozy feel. Will definitely go back. So many choices of wine. They made us feel like we were the only ones there and were special!
Name: Stephanie H.

Description: Refunded this Groupon on 12/31/16. We were warmly greeted upon our arrival. Love the tasting room...full of cute little wine themed gifts, as well as lots of food choices. Sauces, dips etc all available for sale. Tasting included 18 different wines as well as a cheese tray with crackers and yummy chocolate truffles. Our server was extremely knowledgeable about each wine. Definitely will be back!!
Name: Peggy B.

Description: The wine was delicious which made it hard to choose the bottles we ended up taking home!  Our server, Kate, was knowledgeable, fun and had the best recommendations!  I would go back in a heart beat
Name: Valerie H.

Description: Wine was delicious; great date spot!
Name: Devon H.

Description: My wife and I had a fun time.  I really liked the sweet wines.
Name: David M.

Description: Very nice and wine was great
Name: Lakisha J.

Description: Prepare your wallet, the wine is delicious and you will want to buy it all.
Name: Lauren B.

Description: Nice place, great wine!
Name: Robin R.

Description: Quaint atmosphere and delightful blends of homemade wine.
Name: Bill S.

Description: Very funny great staff plenty of refreshments appetizers on menu. Gift shop.
Name: Tynisa P.

Description:
Cute little winery.
Wines and tastings were enjoyable.
Name: Carol W.

Description: Friendly staff, sampled over 20 wines, great atmosphere!
Name: Christina C.

Description: The wines they offer are unique and very delicious.  The staff were all very nice and made the wine tasting experience very enjoyable
Name: Trudy F.

Description: Staff was wonderful and the sweet wines were delicious
Name: Wendy M.

Description: The tasting room was very comfortable and the server very friendly, but I just didn't enjoy the wines
Name: Emily H.

Description: Good service and interesting winesüëçüèºüç∑
Name: Tracie B.

Description: The sweet wines were excellent.
Name: David M.

Description: If you are a fan of sweet, unique wines, this is the place to go!
Name: Sara A.

Description: Nice atmosphere and friendly staff!! Also very good wine!! I will definitely be back!
Name: Lauren R.

Description:
Absolutely great place.  Lovely ambiance and 
fantastic gift shop.  Miranda was pleasant, knowledgeable, and personable.  Wine was very good.
Name: Mary B.

Description: Beautiful spot great wines, good day out with spouse and friends.  Highly recommended
Name: Kristal

Description: Great service, knowledgable about the wines and cozy/rustic style tasting room. Also, for not being a big wine drinker, ALL the wines were delicious!
Name: Amie

Description: lovely atmosphere! & the best tasting wines a must visit!
Name: Laura M.

Description: Be prepared to have trouble deciding which wine to buy! Incredible staff,  awesome wine!
Name: Theresa D.

Description: Very good wine.
Name: Kaysha B.

Description: Beautiful place with nice people. The wines are just wonderful!  I was sure to buy some to share with friends.
Name: JOANN D.

Description: Good wine with 20 tastings available!
Name: Robert C.

Description: Try the fallen Quaker wine it's amazing! The three boys brand has such interesting flavors, unlike anything I've ever had before!
Name: Kristen A.

Description: I highly suggest if weather allows it to sit outside under the tent when doing your tasting, it was a beautiful day and it was great to be able to enjoy the wines outside!
Name: Patricia W.

Description: Wines are delish! They serve a nice plate of cheese and complimentary chocolates. The only complaint that I have is that they serve only a sip; you really need a second sip to gather the full flavor.
Name: Tracy I.

Description: Make reservations. It's very busy because their wines are soo good!
Name: Stephanie D.

Description: Wagonhouse winery was a very relaxing with great service 19 wines tried good time
Name: Kathleen M.

Description: 20 different wines it was great! The complementary glass was a nice touch
Name: Faykeeta M.

Description:
Very nicely done.  We enjoyed it.  We also bought some of the delicious wine.
Would recommend it.
Name: Patricia G.

Description: The wines were great, and the service was awesome! Very relaxing. Definitely a great outing for anyone!
Name: Melissa F.

Description: great service, amazing wines.  provided small snacks for table.  great atmosphere. quaint.
Name: Hilary

Description:
Real nice place, worker are real nice and wine is good. Strawberry is my favorite one they have. 
Just one thing their seats are a little hard if you get stuck on a stool chair.
Name: Raymond R.

Description: great atmosphere, great wines, great snacks. definitely worth the money
Name: Caitlin O.

Description: The wine tasting experience was a lot of fun. The server was very informative and friendly and we spent about 1 1/2 hours there trying about 25 wines.  Very relaxed environment and the d√©cor was great for Halloween.
Name: Mira S.

Description: Drink portions were right on I don't remember the girl who waited on us but she was very knowledgeable on the wines we were given. The atmosphere was very nice. I would certainly go there again.
Name: Carol P.

Description: Loved the ambiance. Lots of different seating options. The staff was very welcoming and attentive.
Name: Nancy G.

Description: Try to make a reservation or get there early it's a lovely local winery that is becoming the talk of the town!
Name: Letty S.

Description: Very nice, quaint winery.  The staff are wonderful and lots of things to buy as well as the wine.  Enjoyed ourselves.
Name: Michelle K.

Description: This winery is good for people who like sweet wines.  The atmosphere and scenery are warm and welcoming.  I'm not a sweet wine person but had an awesome time.
Name: Hope L.

Description: It was a good wine tasting.....would like to see tours offered.
Name: Donna J.

Description: Amazing tasting and staff!
Name: Tianna E.

Description: just overall was an amazing first time experience at a winery and im very glad it was at this one!!!
Name: Maria G.

Description: Staff is wonderful! Excellent wine knowledge.
Name: Mindy G.

Description: Great place with a friendly staff! We will definitely be back.
Name: Candace B.

Description: The decor and atmosphere at the Wagonhouse Winery make it a terrific place to visit with friends while tasting their wines. We were able to sample 25 wines, although each tasting was just a small sip. Most of their wines are sweet dessert wines with unique flavors, but they do have a selection of dry wines as well. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable, and we had a great time.
Name: Denise W.

Description: Staff is so wonderful that I am celebrating my 40th.  The different blends in their wines prove to be equisite.
Name: TERESE W.

Description: Go at anytime forms wine tasting. The place is fabulous and the staff are absolutely amazing!
Name: Jason M.

Description: Really enjoyed the tasting. The staff were really nice and helpful. You taste a lot of wines. Great for the price. A must try.
Name: Kimberle S.

Description: My group had a wonderful time.  Staff very friendly.
Name: Donna K.

Description: Great Wine Tasting Experience! Staff was very knowledgeable and pleasant. Had a nice afternoon there. Brought 4 bottles of wine home.
Name: Dinese C.

Description: This place is ahhhhhhmazing! We had a great time and the staff was awesome! We will definitely be back!
Name: Tianna E.

Description: I enjoyed the experience, however, this was not    my first wine tasting
Name: Evelyn D.

Description: I thought the tasting was nice, however, we were poured a very small amount of wine in our glasses.  The price of $10 was a little high in my opinion.
Name: Cathy B.

Description: Very small portions poured for tasting. Hardly enough to get a good sense of the flavors.
Name: Deborah L M.

Description:
The Wagonhouse Winery. Is a very friendly quaint establishment. kelly was very knowledgeable and informative about all the wine. We had a good time and bought couple of bottles.
Thanks for a great time
Name: Annette T.

Description: Wagon house has a comfortable tasting room. The servers are very knowledgable about the wines the winery offers. Theybalsomshare some recipes for using wine in dinner items and also desserts. A wonderful way to spend a few hours enjoying some wine and relaxing.
Name: Carol A.

Description: The tasting room is nice and cozy and we got to taste about 18 wines even though the tasting amount was a little small   However we did find a wine we liked and purchased a bottle which we sat and drank in the tasting room  Overall a nice experience
Name: Rick S.

Description: Very nice tasting room and close to another winery on the Jersey wine trail.
Name: David M.

Description: The Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable... The tasting room was very nice and cozy.
Name: Maria D.

Description: The service was great and very friendly.  We enjoyed the cheese and crackers and chocolate that came with buying the Groupon.  It is very cool looking inside and we would go back.
Name: Sheryl C.

Description: Great atmosphere and wine tasting experience. The wines are good, not great (if you're a wine expert) but still a fun experience!
Name: Kelly M.

Description: Definitely a fun time! Beautiful place inside!! Great service!
Name: Danielle B.

Description:
Great service and knowledge 
Beautiful place 
Loved it and will bring friends back with us
Name: Nick D.

Description: Great service and great selection.. It was worth the trip!
Name: Anita A.

Description: My friends and I (a total of 6 people) were seated a big table in the main room.  The host (wine server) was very knowledgeable and helped up with our wine tasting/buying decisions. Loved the wines!
Name: Linda D.

Description: It was 4 of us ladies  we talk and had fun the service was great.
Name: Carmen R.

Description: Cozy cute establishment . Staff was very great , positive and personable . However , their drink portions are extremely small. I would have liked just a little bit more wine on each tasting . You were given a lot of selections 16 to be exact but again a slightly bigger portions would have been perfect . I would suggest this place to friends & fam .I would go back for sure . I would like to try a other winery as well if groupon offered other wineries in the future .
Name: Ingrid M.

Description: The wines were great the staff was nice but the tasting room is very small the atmosphere seemed to be quiet and romantic but there was a few loud guests that made it very uncomfortable and hard to enjoy my date  But overall it was a nice place and I would go back
Name: Monica C.

Description: Nice ride in the country.  Tasting room is small, so make a reservation.  Enjoyable afternoon.
Name: Geri D.

Description: My husband and I had an enjoyable time at Wagonhouse Winery.  We liked most of the wines we sampled even the drier wines which we normally don't like.  The atmosphere was nice but it was very crowded on the day we came.
Name: Sherri M.

Description: I‚Äôve experienced a wine tasting and tour a couple months ago at different place and it was a bad experience (purchased from Groupon) so I was little nervous about buying a wine tasting from Groupon again but I decided to visit the Wagonhouse, read up on the reviews and seen their website. I‚Äôm sooooo happy I decided to buy a wine tasting package from them. Amazing place and staff!!
Name: Lyneve L.

Description: The woman that served us wasn't very personable. Her personality was terrible and didn't care to explain what wines we were tasting and why foods to pair it with. The ambience was nice
Name: Meisha T.

Description: More expensive than surrounding wineries, even with groupon deal, wines only okay, nice ambiance
Name: Ethan G.

Description: Love this place!
Name: Gigi T.

Description: Very good
Name: Ilyse F.

Description: Everyone was so pleasant.  Wines were very good.  Walked out with 4 bottles!
Name: Melissa S.

Description: We visited on a winter Saturday festival a wine tasting with reservations.  It was very crowded and we were told reservations were running behind. We were seated late, party of 2, and felt rushed and unattended to.
Name: Julie D.

Description: Service was friendly. There were few other guests present. The wine was reasonable by NJ winery standards
Name: Harvey S.

Description: They were understaffed and complained about it to us, she rushed the wine (even skipping pouring it after explaining because she was in such a rush), and there were SO MANY fruit flies that kept going on our food and in our glasses. The wine was good, but just  buy a bottle for home!
Name: Elena C.

Description: 2nd time at this winery this time went with my friend, sister in law and daughterin law they had a tables reserved for us and we went at Christmas it was beautifully decorated and they had live singing.  Our wine hostess was very informnative and friendly
Name: Mary J.

Description: What a fun time!!!  The staff made the tastings so much fun with stories about each wine
Name: Anne H.

Description: Wonderful service, and great atmosphere.   Will be back for another wine tasting.
Name: James H.

Description: Place was cute. Wines were ok. The amount of time we spent between pours for our tasting was ridiculous as the woman who was helping us was doing everything else too.
Name: Darlene P.

Description: When we first arrived we not acknowledged, and four employees were standing around. Once we greeted an assisted the young lady was very friendly. There were a good number of samples to try, we took two bottles home. And the fig spread...was delicious! I'd say the Groupon was worth it.
Name: Maegann S.

Description: We weren't wild about the wine and you don't get much for the price. The girl that waited on us was very nice.
Name: Rosemary R.

Description: Awesome service & great dessert wines!
Name: Tia M.

Description: The trip was ok..not really what i expected. I assumed there would be a tour of the vineyard . also my server was barley pouring out any of the wine because her spout was pour was malfunctioning. As a result i had to ask a few times if she could give me a little more so i can taste the flavors she describing. I only asked a few times because i didn't want to seem greedy.
Name: Kareema C.

Description: We had a great Sunday Funday with the girls!! Need some more Pinotage !!
Name: Nicole B.

Description: We had a great time at the Wagonhouse Winery using our Groupon for four. The only negative was the amount poured for wine samples and the cheese sample were very small. The wine samples were not even and the samples barely give you a chance to really taste the wine. Our hostess was fun. My son and his girlfriend enjoyed their first visit to a winery and purchased two bottles.
Name: Erin K.

Description:
I liked the one on one approach to all people that come for the tastings. The facility is fantastic. I like the Pantry items you have for sales.
Well done
Name: Colleen S.

Description: Perfect setting for wine tasting. Go with your significant other or with a group of friends and you will definitely have a great time.
Name: Jamal M.

Description: The setting was perfect. We had a group of 5@4 ladies and everyone had a blast.
Name: Brooke G.

Description: My husband and I had a great time. We bought a case of wine to take home and a bunch of goodies from the store. A nice romantic time or fun with friends.
Name: Jaleyne J.

Description: The wine expert was very welcoming, friendly, and knowlegable.
Name: Jessica P.

Description: We had such a great girls day at this winery. So welcoming and 20 some wines to taste.   They had some really different great summer wines. The service was excellent. Definitely going back. Loved the atmosphere. It is very popular place, it got pack around 2pm.
Name: Donna P.

Description: Nice server and a lot of wines to try! Cute little place
Name: Lauren

Description: It was good. Lots of wines to sample. But we never got the slate coaster that was part of the Groupon
Name: Megan K.

Description:
Great Staff, 
place and wine
Name: Thomas C.

Description: The wine sampling was great.  A little of everything. Host was extremely knowledgeable and friendly.   The cheese snacks were great also.  Highly recommend.   Great for a date.
Name: Evelyn K.

Description: Our server was great, I wish I could remember her name but she only had 3 days on the job but she was really sweet
Name: Yolanda J.

Description: Had a great time
Name: Jeannie N.

Description: We had an amazing time me and my husband and the wine was fantastic!!!!
Name: Selina W.

Description: The employees are very knowledgeable and friendly
Name: Renee D.

Description: This place was awesome. From the wine sampling, the tapas on the menu, to the seasonal Christmas items they had for sale. An additional plus, my hostess, she definitely knew her stuff and had drink recipes that surpass what you'd find on Pinrest. I'm going again with more friends!
Name: Joy F.

Description: I truly cannot get enough of this place. Very impressed.
Name: KELLIE B.

Description:
I believe we met the husband outside them the wife took care of us insider.  It was a very very busy day which made our wine tasting more than 3 hours long and most if it was patiently waiting .  She could not be more apologetic.  
The wines were nice , not as dry as we prefer  but Over all it was nice !
Name: Louvenia C.

Description: Very awesome!
Name: David M.

Description: We enjoyed all of the wines we got to taste. We had reservations as required and seemed to get forgotten a couple times for people who walked in. If you buy any of the dips and items sold in their tasting room, check expiration dates. I didn't buy something because it was expiring in less than a month.
Name: Heidi R.

Description: Wine tasting took 2.5 hours which is entirely WAY too long. They need a better system to handle the crowd that can show up on a busy day. Wine tastes good.
Name: Herb K.

Description: the young lady was very informative as well as pleasant. There have a great wine tasting selection. I am already planning my next visit!
Name: Marisa A.

Description: Had a good experience even though it was a little far for me.  In comparison to other winery I believe there wine prices were a little high.
Name: Pedro C.

Description: The ladies are extremely knowledgeable of wines and they have a lot of wines! The wine tasting I purchased was well worth the cost which as very minimal for ALL the wines, cheese, crackers, truffles, glasses & the slate coaster.  Charming atmosphere with beautiful furnishings-living room area, small high top tables made from wine casks, a large bar and fantastic food/gift items available for sale-and of course, LOTS of wine to buy and take home.  GREAT JOB to Wagonhouse Winery!!
Name: Virginia H.

Description: Great atmosphere and staff was very knowledgeable about the wine.
Name: Dawn G.

Description: Very cute place and staff was very friendly. Only wish wine tasting samples were a little bigger. I could barely see the wine in my glass it was such a tiny amount.
Name: Jennifer C.

Description:
This was an amazing experience.  Kate was incredible as she went through each wine, discussed the notes and what to pair it with.  Unlike a previous experience at a PA winery, she appreciated our love for sweet wines but still took us through everything Wagonhouse offers.  And they offer a lot! The nibble tray was perfect and we even stayed and had a glass of wine.

We love you, Kate, and we will be back!!!!

Highly recommended, especially if you love sweet wine.
Name: Jacquelene C.

Description: Friendly environment.
Name: Beth T.

Description: Our young lady was pleasant, informative and enjoyable! It was our 1st wine tasting and it was enjoyable! Went home with a total of 7 bottles for party of 5.
Name: Deborah A.

Description: Friendly staff, wide variety of wines.  Would definitely recommend to others
Name: Joanne L.

Description: So adorable! Great wine!
Name: Letty S.

Description: Our first wine tasting and it couldn't of been better. Cute little place with knowledgable workers who were very polite and pleasant.
Name: Shelley M.

Description: It was a quaint and lovely setting. Miranda was a great hostess. We enjoyed the variety of wines.
Name: Dana M.

Description: Very cute setting. My fianc√© and I enjoy ourselves. Wine was really good. Bought a few bottles to take home.
Name: Holly K.

Description: Amazing!! Very friendly staff! Great wine!
Name: Bear S.

Description: The wine was very good and the service was great. The afternoon spent at Wagonhouse Winery was very nice and is a place I would like to visit again.
Name: Kristina N.

Description: A great place but staff made it a great time.
Name: Dan

Description: Nice place and great service.
Name: Jesse K.

Description: Great service, Great selection of wine to taste. Great place.
Name: Russell J.

Description: The place was great quite and screne, i loved it.
Name: Veneria W.

Description: Very calm place you can enjoy!
Name: April C.

Description: We had a fantastic time and can't wait to go back!
Name: Sandy S.

Description: GREAT PLACE TO SPEND A NICE SUNNY AFTERNOON. I HAD A LOVELY DAY THERE.
Name: William B.

Description: Had a wonderful time
Name: Shanaya S.

Description: Love this place!!!
Name: Michelle L.

Description: Great!
Name: Asia N.

Description: This is a great place to go wine tasting.  Very friendly and welcoming.
Name: Yisenia T.

Description: Very good place for a date
Name: George

Description:
Great variety of wines and the hostess had so much info about each.

Lots of fun!!
Name: Debbie S.

Description: our Guide was Ashley, she took us thru the Wagonhouse collections with knowledge and professionalism, really enjoyable experience and would highly recommend
Name: Prudence G.

Description: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff
Name: LONNIE B.

Description: Lots of tastings and a very relaxed atmosphere. We had a fantastic time.
Name: Tracey R.

Description: It is a small tasting room but very comfortable and relaxing. They have a large selection of wines, some of them are deliciously unique. Half of the wines are semi sweet or sweet blends, but even a dry wine lover will want to bring a few home after tasting them.  They pair the wine tasting experience with some great tasting cheese, just to make the experience that much better.
Name: Sherry Z.

Description: We loved it!! I bought it for my moms birthday and Miranda was wonderful!! Sweet geniuine and she knows her stuff about wine!! Nice and homey feeling when u walk in. We will defiantly be back
Name: Jamie H.

Description: We enjoyed ourselves very much. Very relaxed setting, staff friendly.Liked the idea of reservations, never got crowed or to loud. will be a return guest.
Name: Donna A.

Description: Smaller pours but SO MANY WINES!! Loved it. Definitely going back.
Name: Maria L.

Description: It's a beautiful family orientated winery. I would definitely recommend that you make reservations before going.
Name: Angelina O.

Description: Need to make reservations before you go.
Name: Leo R.

Description: Definitely recommend making a reservation. Very nice atmosphere, but not a large enough space for when it fills up. Having a reservation helped us to be guaranteed a table.
Name: Caitlin M.

Description: Nice setting
Name: Maureen C.

Description: Very Good!! Cant wait to go back...
Name: Karen H.

Description: It is very lovely-the people working are so friendly  We really enjoyed our visit
Name: Maureen M.

Description: I üíú Wagonhouse! Been 3 times, very local to several other wineries so you can visit more than 1 winery if you would like but most close at like 5-6pm even on the weekends, there is one winery about 15mins away thats open later, Auburn Road At Wagonhouse you get @ 20 different samples, make sure to set your budget because you will want to buy a bottle of every wineShore Thing, Sweet Love and Autuumn Goddess were my faves!
Name: Shonyette L.

Description: Very cozy atmospherewonderful people, knowledgeable waitress, great selection of wines
Name: Donia T.

Description: Get the groupon!!!
Name: Steph D.

Description: 21 tastings but very small 1/4 oz shots Nice atmosphere and friendly workers
Name: Fran S.

Description: Beautiful for an afternoon getaway Loved our experience
Name: Mag M.

Description: Amazing ladies working there and left with 5 bottles of wine to enjoy at home!
Name: Jessica F.

Description: Plan to spend some time and enjoy your experience.
Name: Barbara C.

Description: Fun and friendly service would recommend to family and friends.
Name: Maria C.

Description: Try to sit in lounge area.
Name: Francis R.

Description: Plan on visiting near by wineries for a fun day of wine tasting
Name: Lisa S.

Description: A great place for a date, either before or after dinner.
Name: John J.

Description: Tasting was well worth the money. Only complaint was they didn't have much deli on hand. They had very limited snack options due to "switching vendors". We wanted charcuterie, but only had pretzels. Otherwise, lovely!!
Name: Dan

Description: Take your time, enjoy the atmosphere, relax. Had a great time.
Name: Adam L.

Description: this was a gift for my daughter and her friend.  They went the other day.  This was a wine tasting event which they both raved about.  I would definitely recommend this as a place to go.  They were impressed with the many selections of wine they were able to taste test.
Name: Julie P.

Description: They specialize in sweet wines...  Not much dry to choose from
Name: Bruce R.

Description: Make a reservation & give your coupon. Had a great time . Place is a great time with friends or a date.
Name: Natalie C.

Description: Enjoy the relaxing ambiance...
Name: Vashon M.

Description: If you like sweet wines, this is the vineyard for you!
Name: Dawn R.

Description: Make sure you get good driving directions, we used map quest and it was very confusing.
Name: Alice C.

Description: Small setting, very nice experience.
Name: Todd

Description: You get to taste about 20 different wines. Staff was very nice and helpful! Would definitely recommend this winery!
Name: Tee L.

Description: This place is wonderful! Gorgeous inside and the people are so helpful and friendly. I will be going back very soon!
Name: Darlene M.

Description: Concentrate on the type of fruit you like best when deciding upon what fruit wine to purchase.
Name: Diane J.

Description: Great atmosphere. Excellent service. Other products sold would make lovely gifts for family and friends.
Name: Pamela S.

Description: I love going there, can't wait until it's available one groupon again
Name: Dawn M L.

Description: The only down fall would be the limited parking, however, I love the atmosphere! I had such a great experience. I plan on buying in bulk Autumn Goddess for my wedding 10.9.15 :-)
Name: Danielle L.

Description: Go for an early tasting, Candace was our wine planner she was awesome, love the Strawberry Table wine, she also had some great recipes to do with the wine
Name: Mary Ann J.

Description: Nice comfortable setting. Friendly staff. Plan to stay a couple of hours. They do not rush anyone
Name: Patricia D.

Description: Go on a nice day and you can sit outside under a nice tent and enjoy the scenery.
Name: Amanda T.

Description: Everything about the place was amazing!
Name: Gabrielle C.

Description: Try everything.  Be prepared to be very relaxed.
Name: Melinda A.

Description: Very cute and the staff was knowledgeable and pleasant.  Nice for a girls day out or just a couple looking for a nice, relaxing time
Name: Susan C.

Description: People who work there are extremely friendly and knowledgeable.   Shop has a lot of really great knick knacks for purchase
Name: Leslie R.

Description: Be prepared to spend some time - the tasting involves 17 samples. There is also a shuffleboard table.
Name: John B.

Description: Plan to make it a lovely relaxing day
Name: Marandia P.

Description: It's a very comfortable, relaxing place.   Enjoyed it so  much we brought friends with us this time.  Love the tomato wine!
Name: Lauri A.

Description: Serve crackers with the cheese appetizers that are on the optional menu. Make sure you get Kate "Aston", very down to earth and friendly.
Name: Cheryl P.

Description: Well worth it..quite a variety as well as quantity. Well done Wagonhouse!
Name: Howdy H.

Description: This experience does not include any tours of the vineyards but our Hostess, Candice, was quite knowledgeable and friendly. We must have tasted about 20 different wines.... We had a wonderful experience and hope to return again soon.
Name: Isabella D.

Description: Staff was very friendly
Name: Shakera R.

Description: Great atmosphere, inside or under the tent.  Staff was very friendly.
Name: Tifane V.

Description: Really fun experience. Nice outdoor set up. Fun for a few people or a big group.
Name: Michelle

Description: It was an amazing experience. Perfect for a date or a group of friends
Name: Elyse K.

Description: Be sure to make a reservation.  They seem to specialize in sweeter fruity wines.  The experience was great and we plan to return.
Name: William S.

Description: Just get ready for a very lovely experience.  It was great!!
Name: Arden W.

Description: make a reservation it really does make a difference
Name: Rita J.

Description: Try everything! Wine that is...
Name: Ken F.

Description: love this place... so cozy and quaint. the staff delightful and loved the wine....:) I will definately be back again
Name: Wendy P.

Description: We did not get there until 4pm and they close at 6pm, so I would recommend getting there early and send some time because the place was very nice,  You can sit and relax, taste the wines and decide which ones you would like to purchase.
Name: Kathleen H.

Description: the place is very quaint and the history of the winery is impressive. the appetizer was very nice, delicious chocolate with the cheese. they had seventeen wines to taste. the wines were ok, some better than others. if you are going for a nice treat and not so much for the wine, then I recommend wagonhouse.
Name: Marie C.

Description: Not any tips to share just want to thank the staff at Wagonhouse for an awesome time! They made our wine tasting a fantastic experience. Definitely will be visiting there again!!!!
Name: Mary P.

Description: Go there. It's has a very specific aura and vibe. Reminds you of chilled nights in October strolling around pumpkin patches, adorned with a scarf and heated apple cider. The groupon is also a great deal.
Name: Adam T.

Description: Amazing  time!
Name: Betty C.

Description: Had a lot of fun and was well worth the m on ney with 18 (YES 18!) tastings plus ceese crackers and chocolates and yes you keep the glass, which happens to be the very hand comfy stemless kind. Try the tomato pepper wine, very unique.
Name: Dawn C.

Description: It's a small but very nice winery, It can and will get very busy. you come late you may have to wait. The wine list can have up to 20 being offered. this depends on the time of year. We do plan on going back again just to enjoy a couple bottles of wine. The staff does a great job on making you feel welcome.
Name: Peter H.

Description: Make reservations early since they close at 5.
Name: Lindsay L.

Description: I had a good time and if you are looking for something new to try go to the wagonhouse whinery they were so friendly there.
Name: Jacqueline M.

Description: Move a little faster and be more attentive. The lady we had kept talking for long periods of time to other people. Up to 10 minutes in between tastings. We didn't even get a chance to taste all the wines and we were there about 2 hrs. Very tasty sweet wined though.
Name: Martha R.

Description: Friendly staff would definitely visit again
Name: Jerome J.

Description: It was wonderful! I went with a friend last Sunday and they were packed. Our "bar tender" was wonderful. Once things calmed down she sat with my friend and got to know us better.  I plan on bringing my mom back - she would love it! Walked out of there with 3 bottles of wine.
Name: Erin S.

Description: Love the feel of the winery, made u feel very comfortable & welcomed .wanted to sit there for hours !!
Name: Rose C.

Description:
My wife and I visit several different winery's in South Jersey.  Wagonhouse is now at the top of our list.  Highly knowledgeable staff, a very diverse selection that included a blended/flavored wine named "kick in the glass".  Great variety,  welcoming atmosphere all make this a memorable spot that will warrant a return visit.
Bob and Carla
Name: Robert S.

Description: I really enjoyed it. Will definitely go again.
Name: Veronica D.

Description: I had a great time! Friendly staff and great selection of wines. I plan to return soon.
Name: Nakia B.

Description: Had a great time, but did get a bit crowded
Name: Meredith K.

Description: Excellent variety of wines. Knowledgeable and friendly staff. We really enjoyed our time there and would definitely go back.
Name: Roseann C.

Description: Had a good time there and will go back soon
Name: Charles F.

Description: Was a great experience.  Nice decor & atmosphere.  Relaxed enviroment and staff was not pushy to make a purchase after the tasting.  Because of this (and the great taste) we wound up purchasing 4 bottles off of their vast list.
Name: Jim C.

Description: First wine tasting experience. Enjoyed it, but thought we were rushed. The tasting of each wine was too quick and I felt like I had to gulp each one down and not really enjoy them.
Name: Cheryl M.

Description: 4 of us went for the wine tasting and had a very nice time and some really good conversation. We tasted 19 differnent wines and had, cheese, crackers and chocolate.
Name: Antoinette O.

Description: Great job
Name: Alisha W.

Description: The initial service was slow and we had to wait over 25 minutes to get started with the wine tasting while everyone else in the establishment was being serviced- including those who came in after us. Finally someone came and started the wine tasting and gave us a rushed but good experience.
Name: Jovan M.

Description: Warm atmosphere! You can bring a picnic lunch with you and sit at a table and relax for the afternoon.
Name: Anna B.

Description: Awesome atmosphere. Delicious wine.
Name: Amanda

Description: WE HAD A WONDERFULLY RELAXING TIME AT THE WAGONHOUSE WINERY.  THE WINERY IS CHARMING AND THE ATMOSPHERE IS VERY INVITING.  WE WILL DEFINITELY BE RETURNING!
Name: Colleen R.

Description: It was a wonderful experience, all the wine tasted great!
Name: Yuqian L.

Description: Nice place, excellent product.
Name: Susan B.

Description: Fast friendly service and Atmosphere.
Name: Harden S.

Description: Their wines were not comparable to any other tastings I have ever been to It was a group of 6 & none of us enjoyed the flavors  We had to use napkins to clean our glasses after each taste The staff was not pleasant as ours was chewing gum like a cow while pouring, didn't want to know why we didn't care for a certain wine and they were behind the bar drinking glasses of their own wine The only good thing about this place was the relaxing atmosphere
Name: Terri A.

Description: Service was great and it is a cute place but the wine not so good. Didn't buy any after tasting 22.
Name: Chris S.

Description: Wine tasting took too long. Cheese served had mold on certain pieces. Snacks were stale. Would not reccomend.
Name: Ling N.

Description: Service not great
Name: Franklin H.

Description: Beautiful little place. I went there in December with friends and had a wonderful time. The woman was so nice and I feel like I learned so much. Went there again and the girl was very young and practically ignored us the whole time. She kept mixing up and bringing the same wines out. If you get someone experienced and it's not crowded you will love it. They need to train new staff better!
Name: Berenice A.

Description: Our server was very nice. Decor was ok. However, cheese & cracker platter, part of the Groupon, had no crackers and the cheese was dried out, like it had been sitting out. We did get the 2 wine glasses that came with the Groupon but got a paper coaster instead of the slate coaster advertised. All-in-all not worth the money, even with a Groupon.
Name: Sarah G.

Description: Short staffed very forgetful and overall so-so experience
Name: ToniAnn C.

Description: It was 5 out of 10 kind of a experience. Wine portions were very small. Selection was fine. Wine was stored in steel barrels instead of Oak barrels. Wine from oak barrels tests much better.
Name: Rasika J.

Description: quality of wine is not good.  lovely facility.
Name: Paula S.

Description: I would love some aging wine and include the cheese on the menu for side purchase because it went great with the wine.
Name: Leticia C.

Description: Most of the wines are not very good.  The after taste is not pleasant, very astringent. The tasting pour should be two tips from the controlled spout.  It would give your wines a fair chance to be savored by the customer.
Name: James D.

Description: We were not greeted when we walked in and there was a sign that said please wait to be seated but people were just walking in after us and being serviced
Name: Tahlia G.

Description: Gave you the smallest amount of wine and the crackers were crumbs
Name: Sarah R.

Description: It was a very nice experience, I enjoyed my tasting very much.  Even better had Mr. & Mrs. Claus there which made us get into christmas spirit.
Name: KATHLEEN

Description: The wine was meh... Could be because of young vines, but there doesn't seem to be a lot of depth in therm. Their set up and d√©cor was beautifully done, however.
Name: Stacie P.

Description: The taste is soooo minial that you can't get a true taste of the wine!!
Name: Carol W.

Description: The sample pour was barely a sip, have been to several other winery this was disappointing.  Would not recommend to others
Name: Jean P.

Description: We had reservations like the groupon asked, but the tasting was REALLY slow.  We have done MANY wine tastings but I have never waited 15 minutes between samples before.
Name: Kelliann D.

Description: The staff was ok but they were more fixated on getting our group out then if we were enjoying ourselves. The amount of wine served at the tasting, though it was more of a variety of wines than other wineries, was ridiculously tiny. Felt cheated.
Name: Marjorie P.

Description: The people working were rude
Name: Helena T.

Description: We showed up at our appointment time, workers seemed unfriendly and mean, they seemed unprepared. The girl who served us our wine was very nice, but didn't know too much about the wines or the cheese. The cat on site was a little too friendly, my friend is allergic and the cat kept jumping on her and on our table where the cheese was and trying to sniff and eat our food. Some of the wines were very good.. but we didn't purchase due to the service. We had another tasting at a different winery and they were very knowledgable about their wines and history etc. Could have been better.
Name: Michele B.
